data.name: The Empress Quest : Full Moons Saga
data.detailed_description:
Kobi the dog moves into a new house with his human. He is not really impressed with this fact. And, if that wasn't enough, he sees a strange shaggy creature in his own kitchen. The uninvited guest vanished into thin air before his eyes! What a mess! But who was that? And, more importantly, how to get rid of it?
After all this mayhem, Kobi gets into a series of incredible events and discovers that he is in a completely incomprehensible place - Moon Valley.
He needs to return home - he don't belong in this strange magic world, his Human is waiting for him, (completely helpless without his faithful canine friend), and, besides, it'll be a mealtime soon! So he needs a help of mysterious Moon Mother, the patron of the Valley who hasn't been seen in years‚Ä¶

Play as a very cute dog, discover mysteries of the house and find a hidden world, full of quirky places and whimsical creatures. Search every corner of the house and the yard, find all of the mysterious creatures living (or not) here and there. Help them solve the Mysterious Disappearance of Precious Trophy and the other strange cases.

Featured:

  • Canine protagonist
  • Cute pig friend
  • Hand-painted backgrounds
  • Hidden world just behind the corner
  • Quirky NPCs
  • Light-hearted story
  • Amazing music
  • THE GHOST SQUIRREL!

Kobi the dog moves into a new house with his human. He is not really impressed with this fact. And, if that wasn't enough, he sees a strange shaggy creature in his own kitchen. The uninvited guest vanished into thin air before his eyes! What a mess! But who was that? And, more importantly, how to get rid of it?
After all this mayhem, Kobi gets into a series of incredible events and discovers that he is in a completely incomprehensible place - Moon Valley.

So he needs a help of mysterious Moon Mother, the patron of the Valley who hasn't been seen in years‚Ä¶

data.short_description: Help Kobi the Dog to solve the secrets of his new house, find the Empress and return to his beloved Master with the help of mysterious Moon Mother. Immerse yourself in this whimsical adventure game with hand-painted backgrounds, quirky characters, light-hearted story and amazing music!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista (SP1)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9400 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Working one recommended
  • Additional Notes: Disk space requirements could differ in the final version of the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7- 8- 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9400 GT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Disk space requirements could differ in the final version of the game
